instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Imac 820-2301-a SN problem,bios file needed please
threads.message:
having a Imac, got worked on by someone else before, the guy didn't do process right i guess and put a SN that didn't belong to the machine.and that made it having few problems now
long story short, need the bios bin for 820-2301-a but can't find it anywhere, just want to see if anyone can help and back up one(if you have the board)

thanks!

threads.title: Imac 820-2301-a SN problem,bios file needed please
threads.message: What are the problems because any BIOS with any serial number should just work, as long as it is from a 2301 board of course.

threads.title: Imac 820-2301-a SN problem,bios file needed please
threads.message: yea,that's the problem,the guy put random number or whatever,its' FFFFFFFFF,something like that, can't update online now for the new OS

threads.title: Imac 820-2301-a SN problem,bios file needed please
threads.message: Just read the chip and look for "SSN" or "ssn" string and change the serial number in hex editor.

threads.title: Imac 820-2301-a SN problem,bios file needed please
threads.message: should i use the original SN or get another one? I do believe the guy previously was to unlock the machine due to a icloud lock i think. if i put back the original SN and connect to internet,it will be locked again right?

threads.title: Imac 820-2301-a SN problem,bios file needed please
threads.message: Use the original SN, no problem....
